snippet: The French equivalent of the Golden Globes makes special mention of Uggie, the canine star of "The Artist."
abstract: The French equivalent of the Golden Globes makes special mention of Uggie, the canine star of "The Artist."
lead_paragraph: Until someone or Kanye West tells us otherwise, the Bagger will take this as evidence that blog campaigns and wild Twitter sprees work: The fine folks at Movieline, who started the "Consider Uggie" campaign on behalf of the little dog in "The Artist," point us to a prize that the Jack Russell terrier has already won. It's from the French, bien sûr. Last month he earned a special mention in the Prix Lumière Awards, France's equivalent of the Golden Globes, with "The Artist" picking up four other nominations - best film, best director, best actor and best actress - over all.

headline.main: Writers, Art Directors and Now Uggie
